entry.title: Friday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 2.

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. High 7. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of rain showers late in the morning and in the afternoon with risk of freezing rain. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming northwest 30 gusting to 50 late in the afternoon. High 7. Wind chill minus 9 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 AM CDT Friday 12 May 2023
